title: Figma To Shopify Developer
salary: $250 per page (as many as you can handle per month)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a reliable Shopify Developer who takes pride in writing clean, well-structured code and translating Figma designs into flawless, responsive Shopify builds.

What You’ll Do
 • Build high-converting, responsive Shopify pages based on detailed Figma designs
 • Ensure pixel-perfect implementation across devices
 • Write clean, maintainable, well-commented Liquid/HTML/CSS/JS
 • Collaborate with designers and PMs to ensure smooth handoffs and consistent quality
 • Tackle occasional dev tickets (edits, fixes, minor changes) efficiently and proactively

Requirements
 • Strong experience with Shopify, Liquid, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
 • Proven ability to deliver pixel-perfect builds from Figma
 • Attention to detail – design fidelity, spacing, typography, responsiveness
 • Clean coding practices and understanding of performance best practices
 • Familiar with Git and Shopify theme architecture

Nice to Have
 • Experience with Shopify 2.0 & JSON templates
 • Understanding of CRO principles
 • QA mindset and ability to self-check before handoff

What We’re Not Looking For
 • Rushed builds
 • Sloppy or bloated code
 • “Close enough” mentality when it comes to design matching
